name: The Last Gun.
description:
My first game! and submission to the BulletHell Game Jam 2021.

The game loosly follows the 10 seconds theme, by spawining in enemies every 10 seconds. Please reach out to me with feedback on things you liked/disliked. This was a great learning experience, and I already have ideas for my next game!

There are some slight graphical issues depending on your screen resolution that I couldn't figure out how to fix.

Controls:

  • Move player - WASD or Arrows
  • Fire Turrets - M (hold)
  • Repair Turrets - N
  • Use Heath Machine - N
  • Pickup the last gun - N
  • Fire gun - M (hold)
